long_description: The Mammut Borah hoodie is a go-everywhere jacket. It's styled to look good around town and is made from breathable, moisture-wicking fleece fabric so you can take to the trails in comfort. Dense but not bulky, Polartec(R) Thermal Pro(R) fleece is warm for its weight; it traps heat while breathing freely and sheds light wind and moisture. Close-fitting hood and hand pockets quickly warm you up. Full-length front zipper with internal windflap; chin guard; elastic binding at cuffs and hem. The Mammut Borah hoodie has a slim, athletic fit.
short_description: The Mammut Borah hoodie is a go-everywhere jacket. It's styled to look good around town and is made from breathable, moisture-wicking fleece fabric so you can take to the trails in comfort.
